message: 請問 有人有玩過 hackpad api 嗎? syntax highlighting 竟然不能運作

description: For some reason, I cannot make the syntax highlighting work with API. The hackerpad python wrapper is from https://github.com/Falicon/Python-Hackpad-API
name: Use markdown in hackpad api
